mapper.select: select id, dict_code, dict_value, dict_type_code, dict_desc, dict_order, parent_id from boot_vue_online_exam.dict where id = #{id}
select id, dict_code, dict_value, dict_type_code, dict_desc, dict_order, parent_id from boot_vue_online_exam.dict limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into boot_vue_online_exam.dict(dict_code, dict_value, dict_type_code, dict_desc, dict_order, parent_id) values (#{dictCode}, #{dictValue}, #{dictTypeCode}, #{dictDesc}, #{dictOrder}, #{parentId})
mapper.update:
update boot_vue_online_exam.dict
dict_code = #{dictCode},
dict_value = #{dictValue},
dict_type_code = #{dictTypeCode},
dict_desc = #{dictDesc},
dict_order = #{dictOrder},
parent_id = #{parentId},
where id = #{id}
